2025 Boston Red Sox Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 40-39, 4th place in AL_East (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 46.6% to make postseason, 1.6% to win World Series

Manager: Alex Cora (40-39)

General Manager: Craig Breslow (Chief Baseball Officer)

Farm Director: Brian Abraham

Scouting Director: Devin Pearson

Ballpark: Fenway Park

Attendance: 1,279,905 (3rd of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 103, Pitching - 103
    One-year: Batting - 95, Pitching - 95

Pythagorean W-L: 41-38, 372 Runs, 357 Runs Allowed
